$interpreted: Zola: Sister Shirley...Just as I thought, you're trying to escape to Rune Academy...
Zola: Sister, you used to be so strong and beautiful. It's a shame to see you in such a miserable state.
Shirley: Miserable? If you ask me, I would say that right now,
Shirley: is the most hopeful I've ever been.
Zola: Nonsense. There's still time. Give me the child and go back with me.
Shirley: You know very well that I won't do that.
Zola: All I know is that child is of dire importance to the Dracontines. On top of that, I've got plenty of ways to make you hand over the child.
Zola: You taught me everything. Don't you remember?
Shirley: I taught you to let you know...how to flourish. How to stand out in the Dracontines' training...
Zola: Every time I couldn't get through a difficult training session, it was always Sister Shirley who took care of me.
Zola: And for that reason...I don't want to see you die...
Shirley: No need to worry about that. I won't die.
Shirley: When I gave birth to this child, I'd already made up my mind. Even if it means making enemies with the Dracotines, I'll protect him at all costs.
Zola: Then there's nothing left for us to talk about.

Model.Text: Sister Shirley...Just as I thought, you're trying to escape to Rune Academy...
Sister, you used to be so strong and beautiful. It's a shame to see you in such a miserable state.
Miserable? If you ask me, I would say that right now,
is the most hopeful I've ever been.
Nonsense. There's still time. Give me the child and go back with me.
You know very well that I won't do that.
All I know is that child is of dire importance to the Dracontines. On top of that, I've got plenty of ways to make you hand over the child.
You taught me everything. Don't you remember?
I taught you to let you know...how to flourish. How to stand out in the Dracontines' training...
Every time I couldn't get through a difficult training session, it was always Sister Shirley who took care of me.
And for that reason...I don't want to see you die...
No need to worry about that. I won't die.
When I gave birth to this child, I'd already made up my mind. Even if it means making enemies with the Dracotines, I'll protect him at all costs.
Then there's nothing left for us to talk about.
